mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ${sidx} ${sord}) RowNo, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM menuSetting WHERE menuType = 'main' ) a ) b WHERE b.RowNo between (1+(${page} - 1 ) * ${rows}) and (${page} * ${rows});
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM menuSetting WHERE menuType = 'main';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM menuSetting WHERE menuType = 'sub' AND menuParentKeyNum = #{menuParentKeyNum};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menuSetting(menuSort, menuType, menuTitle, menuTitleKor, menuParentKeyNum, menuItemType, menuSettingRegistrant, menuSettingRegistrationDate) VALUES(#{menuSort},#{menuType},#{menuTitle},#{menuTitleKor},#{menuParentKeyNum},#{menuItemType},#{menuSettingRegistrant},#{menuSettingRegistrationDate});
mapper.update: UPDATE menuSetting SET menuSort = #{menuSort}, menuTitle = #{menuTitle}, menuTitleKor = #{menuTitleKor} WHERE menuKeyNum = #{menuKeyNum};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM menuSetting WHERE menuType != 'item' ORDER BY menuSort ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM menuSetting WHERE menuType = #{menuType} AND menuSort = #{menuSort} AND menuParentKeyNum = ${menuParentKeyNum} AND menuKeyNum != #{menuKeyNum};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM menuSetting WHERE menuType = #{menuType} AND menuTitle = #{menuTitle} AND menuParentKeyNum = ${menuParentKeyNum} AND menuKeyNum != #{menuKeyNum};
